Interface PcapHandle

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
public interface PcapHandle extends AutoCloseable
Represents an activated libpcap handle.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes the underlying capture handle.
    int
    dataLink()
    Returns the link-layer type reported by libpcap (DLT_* constant).
    boolean
    next(Pcap.PacketCallback cb)
    Blocks until the next packet or timeout and forwards it to the callback.
    void
    setFilter(String bpf)
    Applies a BPF filter string (runs pcap_compile + pcap_setfilter).

  • Method Details

    • setFilter

      void setFilter(String bpf) throws PcapException
      Applies a BPF filter string (runs pcap_compile + pcap_setfilter).
      Parameters:
      bpf - tcpdump-style filter expression
      Throws:
      PcapException - if filter compilation or application fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • next

      boolean next(Pcap.PacketCallback cb) throws PcapException
      Blocks until the next packet or timeout and forwards it to the callback.
      Parameters:
      cb - callback invoked with packet metadata and bytes
      Returns:
      true if a packet was delivered; false on EOF (offline capture)
      Throws:
      PcapException - if libpcap returns an error
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • dataLink

      int dataLink() throws PcapException
      Returns the link-layer type reported by libpcap (DLT_* constant).
      Returns:
      data link type identifier
      Throws:
      PcapException - if the value cannot be retrieved
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • close

      void close()
      Closes the underlying capture handle.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
